citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on Feb 5,
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone/text message and was informed the licensee
was out and not available for the inspection process.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on Feb 5, 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone/text message and was informed the licensee 
was out and not available for the inspection process.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
